meanings: (노년) one's later years, one's declining years
plan for one's life after retirement

vlive.korean: 약간 둘이 보면 약간 노후부부 같지 않아? You two are like an old couple? 듣기 View video OSEN : iKON 아이콘 'Star Road' EP.20
vlive.english: You two are like an old couple?

vlive.korean: [스피드 직독직해] - 열심히 모아서 행복한 노후 - 너구나? [Reading it right away] - Collect hard for happy later days. - Is it you? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 35회 - 여자친구 강제 리더 재선거! 투표 스타트★
vlive.english: [Reading it right away] - Collect hard for happy later days. - Is it you?

vlive.korean: 노후가 기다려지죠. We're waiting for our later years. 듣기 View video EXO : 불토🔥
vlive.english: We're waiting for our later years.

vlive.korean: 최신식이고 노후한 몸. will be new, but our bodies will be old. 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [REPLAY] SECHSKIES LIVE NEWS
vlive.english: will be new, but our bodies will be old.

vlive.korean: 이 노후 배우 가슴에... And when I attach the shinning badge on... 듣기 View video V Special : [REPLAY] 2016 대한민국 대중문화 예술상 시상식
vlive.english: And when I attach the shinning badge on...

examples.korean: They had enough money to live in comfort in their old age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 노후에 편안히 살기에 충분한 돈이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had enough money to live in comfort in their old age. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Education is the best provision for old age. (Aristotle) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육은 노후를 위한 최상의 양식이다. (아리스토텔레스, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Education is the best provision for old age. (Aristotle) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the gerontification of the baby boomer generation 듣기 Add to Wordbook 베이비 붐 세대의 노후화 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: the gerontification of the baby boomer generation Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Education is the best provision for the journey to old age. (Aristotle) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육은 노후로 가는 여행을 위한 최상의 양식이다. (아리스토텔레스, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Education is the best provision for the journey to old age. (Aristotle) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Cherish all your happy moments: they make a fine cushion for old age. (Christopher Morley) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 행복한 순간을 소중히 간직하라: 노후에 훌륭한 대비책이 된다. (크리스토퍼 몰리, 행복명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Cherish all your happy moments: they make a fine cushion for old age. (Christopher Morley) Add to Wordbook
